title: Stitches
author: Shawn Mendes
writters: Daniel John Kyriakides, Teddy Geiger, Danny Parker
copyright: Mega House Music, Music Of Big Deal, Hold The Dog, Danny Clementine Music, Tg Worldwide Publishing

verse1: I thought that I've been hurt before
But no one's ever left me quite this sore
Your words cut deeper than a knife
Now I need someone to breathe me back to life
prechorus1: Got a feeling that I'm going under
But I know that I'll make it out alive
If I quit calling you my lover
chorus1: You watch me bleed until I can't breathe
And now that I'm without your kisses
Aching, begging you to come help
And now that I'm without your kisses
verse2: Just like a moth drawn to a flame
Oh, you lured me in, I couldn't sense the pain
Your bitter heart cold to the touch
Now I'm gonna reap what I sow
I'm left seeing red on my own
bridge1: Gotta get you out of my head
Gotta get you out of my head, get you out of my head
chorus2: You watch me bleed until I can't breathe
Shaking, falling onto my knees (falling on my knees)
And now that I'm without your kisses
I'll be needing stitches (and I'll be needing stitches)
Aching, begging you to come help (begging, Baby, please.)
And now that I'm without your kisses
